title: CS Practical Competency Strengthening: Learning Scenario Design Through Educational Entity-Relationship Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain six types of educational entities (physical/intentional relationships) within learning scenarios
Learners can explicitly express role relationships between entities in instructional design using intentional relationship types
Assigning educational significance to physical relational types can enhance the structure of learning flow
Learning scenarios can be designed using REMM (Relational Entity Modeling Method)-based notation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
